title: (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Delegation of Ministerial
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Delegation of Ministerial 

Functions) (No. 3) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited health (delegation ministerial functions) (no 3) order 2020

title: (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 

the Minister for Health conferred on him - 

(a) by or under the enactments specified in Part 1 of the Schedule, 

and 

(b) under the enactments specified in Part 2 of the Schedule, 

are delegated to Frank Feighan, Minister of State at the Department of Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [599] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister health conferred - (a) enactment specified part 1 schedule (b) enactment specified part 2 schedule delegated frank feighan minister state department health notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 11th december 2020 599 3

title: (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977), hereby order as follows:
heading: Sections 5, 14, 20, 34 and 51 of the Food Safety Authority of Ireland Act 1998
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

PART 1 

Sections 5, 14, 20, 34 and 51 of the Food Safety Authority of Ireland Act 1998 
(No. 29 of 1998) 

Food Standards Act 1974 (No. 11 of 1974) 

Part V and section 5, in so far as it relates to Part V, of the Health Act 1947 (No. 
28 of 1947) 

Milk and Dairies Acts 1935 to 1988 

Misuse of Drugs Acts 1977 to 2017 

Protection of Children's Health (Tobacco Smoke in Mechanically Propelled 
Vehicles) Act 2014 (No. 40 of 2014) 

Public Health (Sunbeds) Act 2014 (No. 12 of 2014) 

Public Health (Tobacco) Acts 2002 to 2015 

Tobacco (Health Promotion and Protection) Act 1988 (No. 24 of 1988) 

Tobacco Products (Control of Advertising, Sponsorship and Sales Promotion) 
Act 1978 (No. 27 of 1978) 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [599] 

PART 2 

European Communities (Control of Drug Precursors) Regulations 2009 (S.I. No. 
558 of 2009) 

European Union (Manufacture, Presentation and Sale of Tobacco and Related 
Products) Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 271 of 2016) 

Misuse of Drugs (Designation) Order 2017 (S.I. No. 174 of 2017) 

Misuse of Drugs (Exemption) Order 2017 (S.I. No. 175 of 2017) 

Misuse of Drugs (Licence Fees) Regulations 1979 (S.I. No. 164 of 1979) 

Misuse of Drugs Regulations 2017 (S.I. No. 173 of 2017) 

Misuse of Drugs (Safe Custody) Regulations 1982 (S.I. No. 321 of 1982) 

Misuse of Drugs (Supervision of Prescription and Supply of Methadone and 
Medicinal Products containing Buprenorphine authorised 
for Opioid 
Substitution Treatment) Regulations 2017 (S.I. No. 522 of 2017) 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [599] 5

title: (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977), hereby order as follows:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Health (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 3) Order 2020 delegates 
to Frank Feighan, Minister of State at the Department of Health the statutory 
powers and duties of the Minister for Health mentioned in the Order. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [599]
